resources.string: Note: Once you click on a stream, it might take upto 20 seconds to buffer. Please wait till data is buffered.
Click on a Bhajan below to view its details.
Listed below are the Bhajans according to your selected criteria. Click on them to view lyrics, meaning, deity, raaga and also to play.
Listed below are you favorite Bhajans. To remove them from your favorites, go to the Bhajan details and click on Unlike.

With Sankeerthan (or \'good music\'), you can search for a Bhajan and view its meaning, lyrics, raaga, deity and to play it. You can search by the name of the bhajan or the specific deity on which the Bhajan is based. Another criteria to search is \'raaga\' which are standard Indian melodic modes. You can also mark your favorite Bhajans and listen to them at any time. Please note that you must be connected to Internet to listen to any Bhajan, view its lyrics, meaning etc. You can also listen to RadioSai Live Streams or view \'Sai Inspires\' for the day. Please send feedback/suggestions to Sankeerthan.Bhajan@gmail.com. Aum Sai Ram
Like our Facebook page to get latest tips and updates:
